article_title: Health Insurance Premiums As Benefits And Deductions

article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb

og.description: Do you pay for your own health care insurance? If so, it may be deductible on your federal income tax return. If you're lucky enough to have your health care insurance paid for by your employer, that's tax beneficial, too: health insurance premiums are generally tax-free to employees.
